description: Thomas Richards was banned from driving when he ran red lights and swerved across a road at 80mph.
title: Isle of Man motorist jailed for 'most horrendous dangerous driving'
title_page: Isle of Man motorist jailed for 'most horrendous dangerous driving' - BBC News
maintext: The court was told his girlfriend, who was sitting in the front passenger seat, had "grabbed the steering wheel" to stop the car going off the road at one point.
